member.summary: The Telephony Server Link. This object exists on the Client, but creates the proxy that lives on the server.

member.name: T:VoiceElements.Interface.TelephonyServerProxy
member.summary: This is the main Telephony Server Proxy. It gets created through remoting on the Server.

member.summary: This is the Client Callback proxy. It gets created through remoting on the Client.

member.name: T:VoiceElements.Interface.TelephonyLinkShim
member.summary: This is a Telephony Link Shim for Dealing With Events

member.summary: This must be set by the client to inform the server the message was received.

member.name: P:VoiceElements.Interface.NewCallEventArgs.Cancel
member.summary: Informs server to drop the incoming call. Leave false to take the call.

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.CacheMode.None
member.summary: Always stream files from client to server, don't Cache.

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.CacheMode.Server
member.summary: Files Names and paths are Server Centric.

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.CacheMode.ClientSession
member.summary: File name and paths Are Client Centric. (Default) The Cache on the server is encapsulated by Session.

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.CacheMode.ClientUser
member.summary: File name and paths are Client Centric. The Cache on the server is encapsulated by UserName

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.CacheMode.ClientNamed
member.summary: File name and paths are Client Centric. The Cache on the server is encapsulated by Cache Name

member.name: T:VoiceElements.Interface.CallProgressEvent
member.summary: The status of a call using call progress.

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.CallProgressEvent.Null
member.summary: The NULL state.

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.CallProgressEvent.SipInviteSent
member.summary: The INVITE message has been sent.

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.CallProgressEvent.SipTryingReceived
member.summary: The system received a TRYING message for this call.

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.CallProgressEvent.SipSessionProgressReceived
member.summary: The system received a SESSION PROGRESS message for this call.

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.CallProgressEvent.SipRingingReceived
member.summary: The system received a RINGING message for this call.

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.CallProgressEvent.RingingInAudioDetected
member.summary: The system detected a ring tone in the audio stream.

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.CallProgressEvent.CallIsBeingForwardedReceived
member.summary: The system received a SIP 181 Call Is Being Forwarded message.

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.CallProgressEvent.CallQueuedReceived
member.summary: The system received a SIP 182 Queued message.

member.name: T:VoiceElements.Interface.StreamingStateEvent
member.summary: The status of the audio stream

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.StreamingStateEvent.Null
member.summary: The NULL state.

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.StreamingStateEvent.FullDuplexStreaming
member.summary: Streming in both directions.

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.StreamingStateEvent.ReceiveOnlyStreaming
member.summary: Receiving Only.

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.StreamingStateEvent.SendOnlyStreaming
member.summary: Sending Only.

member.name: T:VoiceElements.Interface.RtpEncryptionState
member.summary: The current encryption state of the RTP stream.

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.RtpEncryptionState.None
member.summary: No Encryption is being used

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.RtpEncryptionState.SDES_AES_CM_128_HMAC_SHA1_80
member.summary: AES counter mode 128 in use; negotiated using SDES

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.RtpEncryptionState.DTLS_AES_CM_128_HMAC_SHA1_80
member.summary: AES counter mode 128 in use; negotiated using DTLS

member.name: T:VoiceElements.Interface.TransportProtocol
member.summary: The Transport Protocol used for the SIP Session

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.TransportProtocol.Unspecified
member.summary: Transport is unspecified

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.TransportProtocol.UDP
member.summary: UDP Transport

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.TransportProtocol.TCP
member.summary: TCP Transport

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.TransportProtocol.TLS
member.summary: TLS over TCP Transport

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.TransportProtocol.WebRTC
member.summary: WebRTC Socket

member.name: T:VoiceElements.Interface.RtpEncryptionMode
member.summary: The requested encryption mode for the call's RTP stream

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.RtpEncryptionMode.UnsecuredOnly
member.summary: Only unsecured RTP will be used

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.RtpEncryptionMode.SecuredOnly
member.summary: Only secured RTP will be used

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.RtpEncryptionMode.SecuredPreferredUnsecuredAllowed
member.summary: Secure RTP is preferred but unsecured is allowed

member.name: F:VoiceElements.Interface.RtpEncryptionMode.UnsecuredPreferredSecuredAllowed
member.summary: Unsecured RTP is preferred but secured is allowed
